text:
HAPPENING NOW: PM @JustinTrudeau formally announces #AstraZeneca #vaccine approval. 

2 mill. doses from India’s Serum Institute arrive in March.

Btwn Pfizer, Moderna, AstraZeneca, +6.5 mill arrive by end of March. 

“Tens of millions” to follow April to June. #ottawa #covid19 https://t.co/vOdH2FkdOd
